hostname.title: Hostname
hostname.description: Hostname of the Marketing instance we are registering

auth_username.title: Basic Auth Username
auth_username.description: Username for the Communication User on Marketing. This is the Communication User that must be already created on the Marketing System and used for all of the Communication Arrangements (used to expose APIs) we want to register with Kyma/XF

auth_password.title: Basic Auth Password
auth_password.description: Password for the Communication User on Marketing

oauth2_client_id.title: Oauth2 client_id
oauth2_client_id.description: client_id for the Oauth2 server that we will deploy. The oauth2 credentials will need to be used when configuring <redacted> Communication Scenario

application_name.title: Application Name
application_name.description: Name of the Application CR that we created for the Marketing system. We use it for the sourceId when sending events to the event bus and when registering the APIs
